title: Bad Blood of Rosewood
description: Gloria Larson is blindsided when her biological father shows up at her door. When a friend of hers is murdered, she’ll need her friends and loved ones, including the Thorns, the four elderly women she’s come to love, to help her adapt to the changes in her life. Suspicion forces her newfound family to either pull together, or pull apart.
author: Gina Marie Barlean
